name: easy-flux-cosmicjs
description: This is an extenstion of the [easy-flux-example repo](https://github.com/tonyspiro/easy-flux-example).  This repo also demonstrates how to easily add the Cosmic JS browser client to perform read / write / delete operations on given data sets.
author: Tony Spiro <tspiro@tonyspiro.com> (http://tonyspiro.com/)
